fields.name: Rang De Basanti
fields.description: Rang De Basanti is a movie starring Aamir Khan, Soha Ali Khan, and Siddharth. The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to...

fields.name: Paris, Texas
fields.description: Paris, Texas is a movie starring Harry Dean Stanton, Nastassja Kinski, and Dean Stockwell. Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself,...

fields.name: Du rififi chez les hommes
fields.description: Du rififi chez les hommes is a movie starring Jean Servais, Carl M�hner, and Robert Manuel. Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

fields.name: Ratsasan
fields.description: Ratsasan is a movie starring Vishnu Vishal, Amala Paul, and Radha Ravi. A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

fields.name: Drishyam
fields.description: Drishyam is a movie starring Mohanlal, Meena, and Asha Sharath. A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

fields.name: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
fields.description: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu is a movie starring No�mie Merlant, Ad�le Haenel, and Lu�na Bajrami. On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait...

fields.name: It Happened One Night
fields.description: It Happened One Night is a movie starring Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert, and Walter Connolly. A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves...

fields.name: Mandariinid
fields.description: Mandariinid is a movie starring Lembit Ulfsak, Elmo N�ganen, and Giorgi Nakashidze. In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines....

fields.name: Drishyam
fields.description: Drishyam is a movie starring Ajay Devgn, Shriya Saran, and Tabu. Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

fields.name: La battaglia di Algeri
fields.description: La battaglia di Algeri is a movie starring Brahim Hadjadj, Jean Martin, and Yacef Saadi. In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

fields.name: Swades: We, the People
fields.description: Swades: We, the People is a movie starring Shah Rukh Khan, Gayatri Joshi, and Kishori Ballal. A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

fields.name: Koe no katachi
fields.description: Koe no katachi is a movie starring Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami, and Aoi Y�ki. A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.
